body.name: Molblly Queen Bed Frame with Adjustable Headboard, Linen Fabric Wrap, Strong Frame and Wooden Slats Support, No Box Spring Needed, Non-Slip and Noise-Free, Easy Assembly, Dark Grey
features: Adjustable Headboard: The headboard can be adjusted to 42-47 inches in height, suitable for an 8-14 inches mattress. It is made of high-quality linen fabric and wrapped with high-resilience memory foam. The high-density foam is soft and breathable, bringing you a comfortable backrest experience.

Sturdy and Durable: Molblly bed frame is made of high-hardness metal and high-quality wood with high-density foam wrapped around the side, with support brackets in the middle of the bed frame, which can be up to 900lb. Which can effectively prolong the life of memory foam or spring mattresses, no box springs are needed.

9 Support Points: Compared to other bed frames, molblly bed frame provides 9 supportive feet increasing longevity. Equip with foot pads at the bottom of the bed feet can effectively protect your beloved floor from scratches.

Noise-free Design: the slats of this upholstered bed frame are specially designed with velcro to prevent friction. in addition, the foot of the metal bed frame has non-slip feet pads to protect the floor and reduce noise, giving you a quiet and comfortable resting environment.

Easy to Install: Assembly in 30 minutes. We package the entire bed frame in a box. For all installation parts and instructions, please unzip the headboard. If you have any questions, please contact us by clicking the "Contact Seller" button. 5-year worry-free warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Adjustable Headboard The headboard can be adjusted to 42-47 inches in height, suitable for an 8-14 inches mattress. 100% high-density sponge filling. Extra Storage Space Durable legs give you 7.5 inches of bottom clearance for easy storage.

Strong Support Sturdy frame creates a supportive foundation for your mattress. You can rest your mattress directly on top of, with no box spring needed. Noiseless Design Use velcro design fix it, no squeak and mattresses won't slip away. Thickened wooden slats provide ample stable support

Assembly in 30 minutes We package the entire bed frame in a box. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A quality bed
reviews.reviewText: Like most people I was hesitant to buy a bed off Amazon, especially one I would have to put together. Would it be quality? Would it be a pain?I did some research and the reviews of this bed were really good so I took a chance. So glad I did.There are some important notes I'd like to make.. one the color is not really off white. If I had to guess it's a very, very pale grey color but still very pretty. Two...it says 30 minutes to put together...not quite but close. It took about 45 minutes mainly due to some of the parts not being labeled but the instructions are easy to follow. Third some of the wood was rough and I almost got a few splinters but a little sanding later all good.The bolts used are super thick and seem sturdy. The tool that comes with it is next level. No awkward Allen wrench with this bed. Once the frame is in place it seems super sturdy. The metal felt light and I was nervous but once assembled it was strong. The headboard was tricky to attach but not horrible. I'm sure if I didn't assemble it alone it would have gone faster but all in all not bad.There was a slight creaking sound but I'm not entirely sure it's the bed...could be the new mattress. Only time will tell. If it is the bed it's possibly the slats making the sound. I screwed the bolts in so tight there is no way I can loosen them.For a bed frame off of Amazon this seems to be a good one. Long term I'm not sure it will or can hold up but only time will tellIf you want something inexpensive that is sturdy, easy to assemble and looks good then definitely get this bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Straight forward assembly. Ok for a guest room
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was straight forward. The instructions are lacking in clarity and detail. Still, it’s fairly easy to assemble. Everything needed is packed INSIDE the back of the headboard. That is VERY SMART DESIGN and much appreciated by me.This is a rock solid bed. No issues with that. But, please don’t confuse it with “lux”…. It isn’t. It’s perfect for a guest room or a dorm or ….. but don’t think that it is a “lux” bed. Functionally is amazing. Fabric, design and details that would make this “lux” are missing. Value for the money is OUTSTANDING. It’s utterly perfect for our guest room. I would not want this in our primary bedroom though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and looks nice. Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is being used with a queen size Lucid 10in memory foam bed.So far we've been using this for a few months without issue.Assembly was quick and easy, taking one person under 45 minutes to put it together.The frame looks nice and is holding up great. It feels very sturdy and I haven't felt as if it would fall apart.This frame was a great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Affordable!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the gray Molblly Bed Frame (King) with Adjustable Headboard and I am very happy with my purchase. One month in and the bed frame seems to be very sturdy and durable, and the adjustable headboard is an absolute fantastic feature that allows me to comfortably sit up in bed to read, watch TV, or simply relax.The assembly process was also very easy and straightforward, which was a nice surprise. I will dock a star as the hook and loop (Velcro) strips on one of the two slat pieces were twisted and stapled which did not allow the slats to rest completely flat, but the weight of the mattress should make it a moot point.Overall, I would highly recommend this bed frame to anyone in the market for a new frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You’ll be glad you got this! It came quickly and in good shape. Put together easily in 1/2 hour. Really dresses up our guest room! Love the headboard. Love the Velcro on the slat supports. Fit perfectly and worked well with our mattress which had no box spring. Gave great support. Our guests love it too! 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moblly Queen-size Bedframe
reviews.reviewText: This is a great bed for the price. It was easy to assemble and allowed me to get rid of my ancient box spring. It is nice-looking and goes well with my contemporary furnishings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light and easy to move
reviews.reviewText: I went from a king size bed to a twin. I needed a frame that was small and not bulky. This was so easy to assemble and sturdy enough to hold me. My room was upstairs and this frame was super easy to bring downstairs because it's light. I've had it for a year and it's still sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Bed for guest room
reviews.reviewText: Bed Frames is good. I have purchased this Bed from from this store for the first time and I am okay with the purchase. I can say that it arrived on time and the packaging and instructions is good.Frame doesn't look that much firm and the quality is okay. I have another Bed frame which looks more strong comparing to this one.The headboard is okay, not much strong.The legs for the headboard are of metal when I tighten the screws it bends, I didn't like.Headboard hight should have been more.
